text: Enave, evarkal cakti kuraintavarkalakak karutappattarkalo anta isravelarkalaik kilakkilum merkilumulla nilappakutikalin atipatikalakkinom; innum avarrile perum pakkiyankalaiyum alittom. Israyilin makkal porumaiyakavum, urutiyakavum irunta karanattal, avarkal mitu um iraivanutaiya alakiya vakkup paripuranamaki niraiverirru melum hpir'avnum avanutaiya camukattarum untupanniyiruntavarraiyum, kattiyirunta matamalikaikalaiyum nam taraimattamakki vittom
